entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is a person who offers to help Harry with the golden egg. He is described as almost a stranger to Harry and has an affronted expression when his offer is refused.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of Harry's friends who turns up at the pub and offers to buy Bagman a drink.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of Harry's friends who turns up at the pub and offers to buy Bagman a drink.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who refuses Bagman's help with the golden egg.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who asks what Bagman wanted when he left.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who sits with him at the pub and asks about Bagman.

relationships.description: Bagman offers to help Harry with the golden egg, but his offer is refused.
